flavorText: Even the clouds became a field of battle. Known as the Sky Theater, it saw the Eternals clash with squadrons of angels.

name: Rally of Wings
originalText: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Rally of Wings affects only creatures you control at the time it resolves. Creatures that gain flying later in the turn or that you begin to control later in the turn won’t get +2/+2.

text: Untap all creatures you control. Creatures you control with flying get +2/+2 until end of turn.
